ComicInfo.Characters: Twitch Williams,Spawn (Simmons),Angela,Sam Burke,Overtkill,Terry Fitzgerald,The Curse,Cyan,Wanda Fitzgerald
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:54:02 [Issue ID 4000-40443] urn:comicvine:4000-40443 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-20 03:40:43. [Issue ID 40443]
ComicInfo.Summary: As the defeated Curse hangs from the walls of Spawn's alley he threatens Spawn and warns him of his vengeance causing the Hellspawn to grow angry. Meanwhile Wanda scours the allies in search of Spawn. She has come to find out why Spawn saved Terry from certain death. When Spawn saves her from a group of thugs (brutally attacked them and nearly killed one of them) she mutters some words of thanks, but can't overcome her fear of him and quickly flees. But she leaves him with a picture of her Terry and their daughter Cyan.
ComicInfo.Title: Protector
